articles.author: Alan Travis
articles.title: Refugees applying to live in UK face being sent home after five years
articles.description: Home Office quietly announces new policy where those applying for permanent residency face ‘safe country review’ after five years’ limited leave

articles.author: Peter Walker, Heather Stewart
articles.title: May and Hammond face serious Tory revolt over tax on self-employed
articles.description: 18 Conservative MPs express opposition to budget measure, which threatens government’s Commons majority of 17

articles.author: Owen Bowcott
articles.title: We need to rethink adoption in the social media age, says senior judge
articles.description: Lord Justice McFarlane suggests too many children are being forcibly adopted and calls for a rethink of UK policy

articles.author: Patrick Wintour
articles.title: Islamic State fighters returning to UK 'pose huge challenge'
articles.description: Security build-up as forecast Isis defeat in Iraq and Syria expected to prompt arrival of ‘deeply indoctrinated’ UK nationals

articles.title: WikiLeaks says it will help Silicon Valley defend against CIA hacking
articles.description: Founder Julian Assange offers tech companies ‘exclusive access’ to technical details to help patch vulnerabilities following a major leak

articles.author: Severin Carrell
articles.title: Trump's Scottish golf resort fails to block evidence in privacy damages case
articles.description: Rohan Beyts is suing Trump’s Aberdeenshire resort after it complained to police that she breached decency laws by urinating on the course

articles.author: Jasper Jackson
articles.title: Phone hacking: lawyers seek access to Murdoch and Brooks email accounts
articles.description: Alleged victims in court bid to prove there was an attempt to cover up hacking at the News of the World and the Sun

articles.author: Tim Hill
articles.title: Trump travel ban could prevent United States hosting World Cup
articles.description: Fifa’s president Gianni Infantino says qualifiers for World Cups need access to the host country, casting doubt on the US’s ability to be part of a bid for the 2026 tournament given

articles.title: Grapes of wrath: wine bar owners sue Trump over unfair competition
articles.description: Khalid Pitts and Diane Gross file a lawsuit against Trump and Old Post Office hotel, asking Trump to resign or close establishment while in office

articles.author: Jamie Grierson
articles.title: I'm still standing: paddleboarder makes world-first Atlantic crossing
articles.description: Chris Bertish arrives in Antigua after 4,050 miles in 93 days, the first person ever to paddle a stand-up board across the ocean
